message.content:
cs.AI, cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.SE, cs.DB. 

The paper discusses the integration of a logical system (IDP) into a widely used programming language (Python) to lower the learning curve for declarative programming. This suggests that the paper may belong to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) or Programming Languages (cs.PL) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper mentions the use of Logic Programming and Answer Set Programming technology, which are commonly associated with the Logic (cs.LO) sub-category. The paper also discusses the goal of allowing IDP to be added to an existing code base with minimal changes, which suggests a potential fit for the Software Engineering (cs.SE) sub-category. Finally, the use of a Knowledge Base system may also suggest a fit for the Databases (cs.DB) sub-category.
